insert into sm_project_change_material ( id, product_category_url, contract_code, category_code, category_detail_code, sku_code, sku_image_path, store_sale_price, design_remark, audit_remark, sku_sqec, sku_model, brand, brand_id, product_name, quota_describe, check_scale, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, materials_status, material_unit ) values

mapper.select:
select DISTINCT CASE spm.category_code
category_code, spm.category_detail_code, pc.name as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, spm.sku_sqec, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, ssd.convert_unit, IFNULL(sum(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(sum(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage from sm_project_change_material as spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_change_dosage as ssd on spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url LEFT JOIN prod_sku as ps on spm.sku_code = ps.`code` where contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'PACKAGESTANDARD' GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

SELECT DISTINCT CASE spm.category_code
category_code, pc.`name` as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.store_upgrade_difference_price,0) as store_upgrade_difference_price, spm.sku_sqec, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, ssd.convert_unit, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(ssd.store_upgrade_difference_price,0)*IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as priceTotal FROM sm_project_change_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_change_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'UPGRADEITEM' GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

SELECT DISTINCT CASE spm.category_detail_code
category_detail_code, pc.`name` as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.store_increase_price,0) as store_increase_price, spm.sku_sqec, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, ssd.convert_unit, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(ssd.store_increase_price,0)*IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as priceTotal FROM sm_project_change_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_change_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'ADDITEM' AND spm.category_detail_code = #{addItemType} GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

select ssd.domain_name, spm.product_name, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.loss_dosage,0) as loss_dosage, CASE ssd.dosage_pricing_mode WHEN 'fixedUnitPrice' THEN '固定单价' WHEN 'foundationPileTotal' THEN '基装增项总价占比' WHEN 'renovationFoundationPile' THEN '装修工程总价占比' WHEN 'dismantleFoundationPile' THEN '拆除基桩定额总价占比' WHEN 'demolitionProjectTotal' THEN '拆除工程总价占比' END as dosage_pricing_mode, IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as store_sale_price, IFNULL(ssd.project_proportion,0) as project_proportion, IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0)*IFNULL(ssd.loss_dosage,0) as totalPrice, spm.design_remark, spm.quota_describe FROM sm_project_change_material as spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_change_dosage as ssd on ssd.project_material_id = spm.id where spm.contract_code = #{contractCode} and spm.category_code = #{categoryCode} and spm.category_detail_code = #{categoryDetailCode}

SELECT DISTINCT CASE spm.category_detail_code
category_detail_code, pc.`name` as cataLogName, spm.product_name, spm.brand, spm.sku_model, spm.attribute1, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.store_reduce_price,0) as store_reduce_price, spm.sku_sqec, ssd.convert_unit, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ssd.domain_name) as domain_name, IFNULL(sum(ssd.budget_dosage),0) as budget_dosage, ssd.loss_factor, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, IFNULL(ssd.store_reduce_price,0)*IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as priceTotal FROM sm_project_change_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_change_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url = spm.product_category_url WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'REDUCEITEM' AND spm.category_detail_code = #{reduceItemType} GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

SELECT ssd.domain_name, spm.product_name, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(ssd.loss_dosage,0) as loss_dosage, CASE ssd.dosage_pricing_mode WHEN 'fixedUnitPrice' THEN '固定单价' WHEN 'foundationPileTotal' THEN '基装增项总价占比' WHEN 'renovationFoundationPile' THEN '装修工程总价占比' WHEN 'dismantleFoundationPile' THEN '拆除基装定额总价占比' WHEN 'demolitionProjectTotal' THEN '拆除工程总价占比' END dosage_pricing_mode, IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as store_sale_price, IFNULL(ssd.project_proportion,IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0)) as project_proportion, IFNULL(ssd.loss_dosage,0)*IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as baseinstallquotaTotal, spm.design_remark, spm.quota_describe FROM sm_project_change_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_change_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'OTHERCOMPREHENSIVEFEE' AND spm.category_detail_code = 'OTHERCATEGORIESOFSMALLFEES'

SELECT ssd.domain_name, spm.product_name, spm.material_unit, IFNULL(sum(ssd.loss_dosage),0) as loss_dosage, CASE ssd.dosage_pricing_mode WHEN 'fixedUnitPrice' THEN '固定单价' WHEN 'foundationPileTotal' THEN '基装增项总价占比' WHEN 'renovationFoundationPile' THEN '装修工程总价占比' WHEN 'dismantleFoundationPile' THEN '拆除基装定额总价占比' WHEN 'demolitionProjectTotal' THEN '拆除工程总价占比' END dosage_pricing_mode, IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as store_sale_price, IFNULL(ssd.project_proportion,IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0)) as project_proportion, IFNULL(SUM(ssd.loss_dosage),0)*IFNULL(ssd.store_sale_price,0) as baseinstallquotaTotal, spm.quota_describe FROM sm_project_material AS spm LEFT JOIN sm_sku_dosage AS ssd ON spm.id = ssd.project_material_id WHERE contract_code = #{contractCode} AND spm.category_code = 'OLDHOUSEDEMOLITION' AND spm.category_detail_code = #{oldHouseType} GROUP BY ssd.project_material_id

select spcm.*,pc.name from sm_project_change_material as spcm LEFT JOIN prod_catalog as pc on pc.url=spcm.product_category_url where spcm.contract_code = #{contractCode} and spcm.product_category_url LIKE CONCAT(#{changeCategoryUrl},'%')
